questions.quote: Yeah. It's an Indian soup. It's simmered to perfection by one of the great soup artisans in the modern era.
Well then the turkey it'll be. And may I say you have a splendid establishment here, my friend. I'm sure you flourish at this location for many, many years.
Look, we're wasting our time here! We're a half-hour late, they've probably took it off the board already.
Aw, they didn't forget to put it out! It's deliberate! Deliberate, I tell ya!
Listen Jerry, I've been doing some thinking. I want my suit back.
Hey, Beth, Arnie, it's Elaine. Um, thought you guys might wanna have lunch. Gimme a call. Bye.
Hey, you know I got someone to make up that cologne for me, big mouth.
Well, nothing. It's no skin off my hide if people like to look. I just didn't see what the big attraction was.
Well, see, it's... businessmen taking siestas. You know, it's the, uh, the Urban Sombrero.
I don't have a preference, okay! Just make a decision yourself! Stop bothering me with every minor little detail, please?
